name: The very hungry slime! (Game for the GMTK game jam 2021)
name_original: The very hungry slime! (Game for the GMTK game jam 2021)
description:
A game which is a bit like tasty planet which i made for the GMTK game jam 2021.
You play as a gray slime which fuses with the environment to get bigger. Get as big as you have to before the time runs out!

I didn't have much time as my birthday was on the second day of the jam, but hopefully you all enjoy!
